title: Urusei Yatsura Movie 1: Only You
synopsis: Lum doesn't need much assistance going ballistic when everyone in Tomobiki gets an invitation to Ataru's wedding -- and she's not listed as the bride! It seems that some 11 years ago, Ataru played "Shadow Tag" with a young girl named Elle and won. Unfortunately, Elle was yet another Alien Princess; and on her planet, if a boy steps on a girl's shadow, they have to marry.
voices: ['Hirano, Fumi', 'Furukawa, Toshio', 'Kamiya, Akira', 'Sakakibara, Yoshiko', 'Inoue, You', 'Nagai, Ichiro', 'Shimazu, Saeko', 'Chiba, Shigeru', 'Washio, Machiko', 'Sugiyama, Kazuko']
